title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Leverage Graph Insights to Turbocharge Amazon Q for Business (IND209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用图洞察为Amazon Q商业版提速 (IND209)
abstract: Unlocking AI's full potential requires labeling of all sensitive data and fine-grained access control to enterprise data. This session introduces a unique graph-based data intelligence solution that works across all data sources to classify data and extract data access insights in order to create a comprehensive Data+AI mapping needed to track what data AI users have access to. Learn to safeguard sensitive data and reliably prevent unintended access to accelerate your rollout of Amazon Q. We will show you how to leverage Amazon Q’s native security controls to mitigate emerging AI risks, such as prompt injections, and improve AI response quality by identifying and minimizing redundant and obsolete data. This presentation is brought to you by Securiti AI, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 释放AI全部潜力需要对所有敏感数据进行标记，并对企业数据实施细粒度访问控制。本次会议介绍了一种独特的基于图的数据智能解决方案，该方案可跨所有数据源对数据进行分类并提取数据访问洞察，以创建跟踪AI用户可访问哪些数据所需的全面Data+AI映射。学习如何保护敏感数据并可靠防止意外访问，以加速Amazon Q的推广部署。我们将向您展示如何利用Amazon Q的原生安全控制来缓解新兴AI风险（如提示注入），并通过识别和最小化冗余和过时数据来提高AI响应质量。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Securiti AI为您呈现。
